text: Cook County state’s attorney’s office says it will review allegations that Chicago cops pulled woman from car by her hair and placed knee on her neck
Mayor Lori Lightfoot denounces vigilantism in Chicago after white men patrol Bridgeport streets with bats
Illinois schools can resume in-person classes this summer following statewide coronavirus shutdown, Gov. Pritzker announces
Chicago police car crashes into SUV, killing driver, while chasing suspect wanted in homicide and several shootings
Grocery stores that closed during the George Floyd fallout start to reopen. But food remains elusive in some neighborhoods.
21-year-old describes being stabbed while trying to stop looting in Naperville. ‘I really don’t like where this world is going to. It’s going to a dark, evil place.’
